title: Nuveen Emerging Markets Debt 2022 Target Term Fund (JEMD) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen Emerging Markets Debt 2022 Target Term Fund ( JEMD  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.038 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased JEMD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 10th quarter that JEMD has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $8.94, the dividend yield is 5.1%.
The previous trading day's last sale of JEMD was $8.94, representing a -4.28% decrease from the 52 week high of $9.34 and a 22.3% increase over the 52 week low of $7.31.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the JEMD Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
